description: This is a header file for the DobbySpecGenerator class within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. It declares the class and its methods for generating a runtime specification, including creating JSON components for container configuration such as environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other runtime parameters. It also includes necessary headers and external references.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating runtime specifications for containers, including JSON configuration components related to environment variables, mounts, plugins, and system limits.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates the container runtime specification as a JSON string based on the provided application configuration and runtime configuration.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates a JSON value representing environment variables based on application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates a JSON array of mount points for the container.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates a JSON array of RDK plugins to be included in the container spec.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for the minidump plugin configuration.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for the App Service SDK plugin configuration.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for network plugin configuration.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a JSON object representing a bind mount with source, destination, and options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines whether GPU should be enabled based on the application configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves the system memory limit for the container based on configurations.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves the GPU memory limit for the container.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (video processing unit) is enabled in the configuration.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Returns a string representing CPU core allocations.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates JSON with classic plugin configurations based on application and runtime config.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for Ethan log plugin configuration.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for multicast socket plugin.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for Ion memory plugin.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for Thunder plugin.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for OpenCDM plugin configuration.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates a JSON value for private data mount point.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates and adds FKPS mounts to the specs JSON.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates a temporary file system mount point JSON object.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates a resource manager mount configuration.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Returns the working directory as a JSON value.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps configuration JSON.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes a URL string for transport or storage.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds a hole punch port to the specification JSON.
